name: Induction Cooktop Test Drive
description: Borrow induction cooktop unit for two weeks; includes cooktop, pan, and instructions with return shipping label
fullDescription: PG&E's Induction Cooktop Test Drive lets customers try induction cooking at home before making a purchase decision, with a free two-week loaner including everything needed to get started.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free two-week induction cooktop loan
- Portable single-burner induction unit
- Induction-compatible pan included
- Instructions and cooking tips
- Pre-paid return shipping label
- No cost or obligation to buy
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a PG&E customer
2. Visit the Induction Loaner Library website
3. Reserve an available induction cooktop
4. Receive unit by mail
5. Try it for two weeks
6. Return using included shipping label
keywords: induction cooktop, loaner, free trial, PG&E, electric cooking, stove, gas replacement, try before buy
